title: The Geek Girl's Guide to Cheerleading
description: A YALSA 2012 Popular Paperback pick in the Get Your Geek On category!When self-proclaimed geek girl Bethany Reynolds becomes the newest member of the varsity cheerleading squad, she realizes that there's one thing worse than blending into the getting noticed. Who knew cheerleading was so hard? Well, at least there's a manual, The Prairie Stone High Varsity Cheerleading Guide. Too bad it doesn't cover any of the really tough questions. Bethany is going to need all her geek brainpower just to survive the season!
author: Charity Tahmaseb
